S06bsu030_u:7: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:9: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavānanekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma //
S06bsu030_u:10: atha khalu tasyāmeva parṣadi suvikrāntavikrāmī nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito 'bhūtsaṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:11_0: sa utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya
S06bsu030_u:11_1: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - pṛccheyamahaṃ bhagavantaṃ
S06bsu030_u:13: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - pṛccha tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmiṃstathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yadyadevākāṅkṣasi /
S06bsu030_u:16: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu030_u:17: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitetyucyate?
S06bsu030_u:18: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06bsu030_u:19: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati?
S06bsu030_u:20: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayato māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ (na)
S06bsu030_u:22: kīdṛgrūpaiśva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāvihārairviharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati?
S06bsu030_u:23: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:24: yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi bodhisattvānāṃ [Vaidya_2] mahāsattvānāmarthāya,
S06bsu030_u:25: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bahujanahitāya pratipanno bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:26: etarhyanāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāma iti //
S06bsu030_u:27: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paripṛcchati sma - kiṃ tvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyaṃstathāgatametadarthaṃ paripṛcchasi?
S06bsu030_u:28_0: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - sarvasattvānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:28_1: vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya tathāgatametamarthaṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ sarvasattvahitāya sarvasattvānukampāyai /
S06bsu030_u:32: tatra ye sattvā niyatāḥ śrāvakayāne bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:40: sarvasattvānāṃ ca bhagavan kuśalamūlasaṃjananaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati tathāgatena imaṃ prajñāpāramitāpraśnaṃ visarjayatā /
S06bsu030_u:41: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:71: na vayaṃ bhagavan evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:76_0: teṣāṃ nihatamānānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavaṃśchinnaviṣāṇavṛṣabhopamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmāvrīḍhaśalyānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:77: ye dharmamapi nopalabhante nābhiniviśante kutaḥ punaradharmam,
S06bsu030_u:78_0: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmāśayaśuddhānāmaśaṭhānāmamāyāvināmṛjukānāṃ
S06bsu030_u:79: (teṣāṃ) vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu030_u:80: ye te bhagavan sattvā bodhijñānamapi na manyante nābhiniviśante nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu030_u:82: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ kṛtaśastathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca /
S06bsu030_u:83: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavannarthāya hitāya sukhāya yogakṣemāya tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:84: sarvasattvānāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan sukhamupasaṃhartukāmā anuttarasukhaṃ niruttarasukhaṃ nirvāṇasukhaṃ buddhasukhamasaṃskṛtasukham /
S06bsu030_u:85: tena vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ saṃśayacchittyarthaṃ tathāgataṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:87: niḥsaṃśayāśca bhagavan sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃśayaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayitukāmāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:91: na ca vayaṃ bhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ kiṃcidanyatsukhaṃ samanupaśyāmo 'nyatra prajñātaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:92: na cānyatkiṃcidbhagavan sarvasattvānāṃ sukhamasti anyatra bodhisattvayānānmahāyānāt /
S06bsu030_u:93: tena vayaṃ bhagavan imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ sattvānāṃ sukhamupasaṃhartukāmāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchāmaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:94: bodhisattvānāṃ caitamarthaṃ bhagavan samanupaśyadbhirasmābhistathāgata etamarthaṃ paripṛṣṭaḥ //
S06bsu030_u:95: evamukte bhagavām suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvāṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu suvikrāntavikrāmin /
S06bsu030_u:97: yastvaṃ tathāgataṃ mahato janakāyasyānukampayā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripṛcchasi /
S06bsu030_u:101: sādhu bhagavanniti suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt ////
S06bsu030_u:102: bhagavānetadavocat - yattvaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu030_u:103: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitetyucyata iti,
S06bsu030_u:104: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kenaciddharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā vacanīyā /
S06bsu030_u:106: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā śakyate vaktum - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:149: na tu tatra kiṃcidajñānaṃ yacchakyamādarśayitum - idaṃ tajjñānam,
S06bsu030_u:166: yena jñānenāsau jñānināṃ jñānīti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:176: kaḥ punarvādo yo lokān samanuttariṣyati lokottarayā prajñayā?
S06bsu030_u:186: aṇurapi tatra dharmo na saṃvidyate ya uttartavyo yena cottartavyaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:188: lokottare hi na loko vidyate na lokottaram,
S06bsu030_u:194: na hi yā lokottarā sā vacanīyā, uttīrṇā sā /
S06bsu030_u:201: prajñapyeta - iyaṃ sā prajñā yā nirvidhyatīti /
S06bsu030_u:209: nirvidhyati nirvedhikā prajñetyucyate nirvidhyati na kvaciddhāvati,
S06bsu030_u:213: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvedhikā prajñeti kiṃ nirvidhyati?
S06bsu030_u:223: yaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgato vidhyati,
S06bsu030_u:235: sa evaṃ nairvedhikyā prajñyā samanvāgato yatkiṃcitpaśyati śṛṇoti jighrati āsvādayati spṛśati vijānīte vā,
S06bsu030_u:238: anityato duḥkhato gaṇḍato rogataḥ śalyataḥ śūnyato aghata āghātataḥ parataḥ (pralopataḥ)
S06bsu030_u:241: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin viśalyā nāma bhaiṣajyajātiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:242: sā yasmin sthāpyate tataḥ sarvaśalyānyapanayati nirvidhyati,
S06bsu030_u:243: evameva evaṃrūpairdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bhikṣurviśalyaḥ śītībhūto nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgataḥ saṃsārātyantavihārī nairvedhikaprajñoviraktaḥ sarvatraidhātukāt,
S06bsu030_u:245: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vajraṃ yasminneva nikṣipyate nirvedhanārtham,
S06bsu030_u:250: sa nairvedhikyā prajñayā samanvāgato lokottarayā samyagduḥkhakṣayagāminyānuliptastravidya ityucyate /
S06bsu030_u:253_0: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vaidyaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tantraupayikayā
S06bsu030_u:253_1: mīmāṃsayā samanvāgataḥ syāt sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocanakaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:254: sa yaṃ yameva glānaṃ cikitsati taṃ tameva mocayat /
S06bsu030_u:256: tathā hi sa sarvabhaiṣajyakuśalaḥ sarvavyādhyutpattikuśalaḥ sarvarogavimocanakaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:257: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin tṛtīyā vidyā sarvāvidyopaśamāya saṃvartate,
S06bsu030_u:261: idaṃ ca me suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃghāya bhāṣitam -
S06bsu030_u:262: prajñā śreṣṭhā hi lokasya yeyaṃ nirvedhagāminī /
S06bsu030_u:279: samatānuyātamiti [Vaidya_6] suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kaścidudayati na samudāgacchati /
S06bsu030_u:280: na tasya yaḥ svabhāvaḥ sa svayaṃ saṃbhavaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:287: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ samudayāstaṃgamaprativedhaḥ anutpādāya anirodhāya,
S06bsu030_u:292: tameva pratītya sa dharmo na saṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:294: saiṣā suvikrāntavikrāmin pratītyasamutpādasya parijñā yathābhūtatā anutpādena sūcyate /
S06bsu030_u:304: sa nātīto na anāgato na pratyutpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:315: tena niruddhā eva sarvadharmā jñātā dṛṣṭāḥ pratividdhāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:326: na hi ajñānaṃ kṣayo vā akṣayo vā /
S06bsu030_u:339: api tu nirdeśa eṣaḥ ajñānakṣaya iti vā kṣaya(jñāna)miti /
S06bsu030_u:340: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin akṣayakṣayajñānaparīkṣā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yenāvabuddhā sa kṣayajñānavigataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:347: anirdeśyo hi nirvāṇadhātuḥ sarvanirdeśasamatikrāntaḥ sarvanirdeśasamucchinno nirvāṇadhātuḥ /
S06bsu030_u:350: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇadhāturdeśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:354: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kiṃcidāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:355: sacetsuvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā upalabhyeta,
S06bsu030_u:356: nirdiśettathāgataḥ prajñāyā āraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:359: api tu suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramiteti pārametatsarvadharmāṇāṃ jñānakarmaṇām,
S06bsu030_u:362: na hi vācā na karmaṇā prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:376: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhau bodhiḥ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:380: na ca punardharmo dharmasvabhāvena saṃvidyate anenānubodhena /
S06bsu030_u:385: na ca tathāgatena bodhirjñātā na janitā /
S06bsu030_u:388: na ca bodhau kaścitsattvo vā sattvaprajñaptirvā /
S06bsu030_u:421: yena ca anubuddhā pratibuddhā avikalpā kalpasamucchedāya,
S06bsu030_u:446: idaṃ ca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - na sattvadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:450: yathā ca sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:451: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:456: iyaṃ ca mayā saṃdhāya vāgbhāṣitā - yathā sattvadhātornonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:457: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇāmapi nonatvaṃ na pūrṇatvaṃ prajñāyata iti /
S06bsu030_u:464: na hi buddhadharmāḥ kenacicchakyā ūnā vā pūrṇā vā kartum /
S06bsu030_u:468: tatra na kasyaciddharmasya ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:470: na ca dharmadhātorūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:474: nāpi sattvadhātorvā dharmadhātorvā ūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vopalabhyate vā saṃvidyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:477: tenocyate - na buddhadharmāṇāmūnatvaṃ vā pūrṇatvaṃ vā prajñāyata iti /
S06bsu030_u:479: na tatra śakyaṃ kenacidutkṣeptuṃ vā prakṣeptuṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:491: yo hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin imān dharmānaprajānannanavabudhyamāno bodhisattva ityātmānaṃ pratijānīte,
S06bsu030_u:508: viparyastāḥ punaḥ sattvāḥ svacaryāṃ svaviṣayaṃ svagocaraṃ na prajānanti /
S06bsu030_u:519: na bodhisattvāḥ kalpe na vikalpe caranti /
S06bsu030_u:520: yatra ca na kalpo na vikalpaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:526: sa evaṃ sarvadharmān prajānan na bhūya ārambaṇe vā vikalpe vā carati vicarati vā /
S06bsu030_u:544: ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā na kaściddharmo vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:545: sacetkaściddharmaḥ syāt - ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā,
S06bsu030_u:548: yaḥ ahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā,
S06bsu030_u:551: na hi kaścit suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvo nāma dharmaḥ saṃvidyate yasya syādahamiti vā mameti vā ahamasmīti vā /
S06bsu030_u:557: abhūtamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin nātra kiṃcidbhūtaṃ na saṃbhūtam /
S06bsu030_u:580: yena suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhāya cittamutpādayanti - idaṃ cittaṃ bodhāyotpādayiṣyāma iti bodhiṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:595: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śakyaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu030_u:600: yā punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin utpādasamatā, sā bhūtatā /
S06bsu030_u:601: yā ca cittasamatā yā ca bhūtasamatā,
S06bsu030_u:602: yā ca bhūtasamatā yā ca samatā sā bodhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:605: te punarvikalpya cittaṃ bodhiṃ cābhiniviśya dvayato bodhāya cittamutpādayanti /
S06bsu030_u:633: na hi yathābhūte kaścitsattvo vā mahāsattvo vā /
S06bsu030_u:654: na ca cittamupalabhante na ca caitasikān dharmān,
S06bsu030_u:664: na te ca bhāvayanti na vibhāvīkurvanti,
S06bsu030_u:665: te bhāvānapi nopalabhante na manyante nābhiniviśante,
S06bsu030_u:667: ye ca suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ bodhāya cittamutpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:685: ye punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhernāpi dūre nābhyāsanne samanupaśyanti,
S06bsu030_u:688: etacca me saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - yo hi advayamātmānaṃ prajānāti,
S06bsu030_u:700: yo hi naiva āramupalabhate na pāraṃ manyate na pāramabhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:705: yatra aṇvapi na kiṃcidgantavyaṃ vā adhigantavyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:706: na hyatra āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate / iti ////
S06bsu030_u:713: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - uttrasiṣyanti bhagavan asminnirdeśe adhimānikā nimittacāriṇa iti /
S06bsu030_u:714: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - agatiratrāyuṣman ānanda adhimānikānām,aviṣayaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:722: adhimānaprajñayā niradhimānatāṃ gaveṣante mānaprahāṇaṃ ca gaveṣante /
S06bsu030_u:723: ye punarāyuṣmānnānanda mānaṃ nopalabhante na samanupaśyanti na manyante nābhiniviśante,
S06bsu030_u:726: na ca āyuṣmānnānanda adhimānikānāmarthāya iyaṃ dharmadeśanā pravṛttā /
S06bsu030_u:734: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda nāpi samamupalabhante na viṣamam,
S06bsu030_u:737: na te kvaciduttrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante //
S06bsu030_u:741: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānīyā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06bsu030_u:749: ye punarāyuṣmannānanda bodhisattvā nimittāpagatā animittacāriṇo 'nānātvacāriṇo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvatyantameva niryātāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:753: teṣāmeṣu evaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu na dhandhāyitatvaṃ na kāṅkṣāyitatvam /
S06bsu030_u:755: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi te 'nulomaṃ sthitāḥ, na vilomam /
S06bsu030_u:760: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda yathāyaṃ śāradvatīputro nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:764: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāmudāreṣu dharmeṣu buddhadharmeṣu cittaṃ krāmati /
S06bsu030_u:768: śuddheyamānanda parṣat pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhaparyupāsitā gambhīradharmādhimuktikā gambhīradharmacaritā /
S06bsu030_u:769: viśvasto hi ānanda tathāgato 'syāṃ parṣadi prasahya dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06bsu030_u:776: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda yadā anavatapto nāgarājaḥ pramudito bhavati prītisaumanasyajātaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:780: te 'pi pramuditāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanto mahāvṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06bsu030_u:781: evameva ānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjato ya ime jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:782: te 'pi iha lokadhātau svakasvakāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi gatvā imaṃ dharmasamudayamārabhya teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ purastānmahādharmavṛṣṭimutsṛjanti,
S06bsu030_u:784: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda sāgaro nāgarājo yadā pramudito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:786: ye ca tatra bhavane naivāsikā nāgā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:789: tābhiśca te varṣadhārābhiḥ sukhaṃ ca saṃjānante /
S06bsu030_u:794: asahyā hi ānanda tā varṣadhārā anyairnāgaiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:798: ye ca tathāgatasya jyeṣṭhaputrā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṛtakuśalamūlā udārāśayā gambhīradharmanayanirjātāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:800: śrutvā udagrāḥ prītāḥ praharṣitāḥ sukhaṃ saṃjānante /
S06bsu030_u:801: idamānanda tathāgato 'rthavaśaṃ saṃpratītya śuddhāyāṃ parṣadi mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadati,
S06bsu030_u:807: te khalu evaṃ saṃvibhaktāstasya rājñaścakravartino 'ntike bhūyasyā mātrayā adhikaṃ prema ca prasādaṃ ca saṃjanayeyuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:809: [Vaidya_14] evameva ānanda tathāgato 'pi dharmarājā dharmasvāmī svayaṃbhūrimān putrān saṃnipātya imaṃ dharmaratnagañjaṃ saṃvibhajati ebhyaḥ putrebhyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:811: te mamāntike bhūyasyā mātrayā prema ca prasādaṃ ca gauravaṃ cotpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:814: na hi ānanda hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ cakravartidhanaṃ rocate /
S06bsu030_u:817: kimānanda daridrasattvānāṃ cakraratnena vā hastiratnena vā aśvaratnena vā maṇiratnena vā strīratnena vā gṛhapatiratnena vā pariṇāyakaratnena vā udārairvā vastraiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:819: yāni labdhvāpi prītā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum /
S06bsu030_u:823: nāpyānanda daridrasattvā ratnānyapi prajānanti - asya ratnasyedaṃ nāmeti /
S06bsu030_u:824: evameva ānanda ye tathāgatasya putrā dṛṣṭasatyā bodhisattvāśca mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:828: kimānanda daridrasattvāḥ śrutavihīnāḥ śrutavipratipannā bālā acakṣuṣmantaḥ anena dharmaratnakośena kariṣyanti?
S06bsu030_u:829: labdhvā cojjhiṣyanti anyebhyo 'pi vā dātavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu030_u:830: na hi ānanda caṇḍālā vā pukkasā vā veṇukārā vā,
S06bsu030_u:831: ye vā kecidanye daridrajīvinaḥ sattvāḥ udāraṃ ratnaṃ labdhvā svayaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu030_u:832: te samardhaṃ vā vikrīṇanti ujjhanti vā /
S06bsu030_u:835: daridrasattvā ityānanda sarvabālapṛthagjanānāmetadadhivacanaṃ dṛṣṭipaṅkanimagnānāmaupalambhikānāṃ bandhābhiniviṣṭānāṃ nimittacaritānāmutpathaprayātānām,
S06bsu030_u:836: ye khalu ānanda idaṃ dharmaratnaṃ labdhvā na śaknuvanti paribhoktum,
S06bsu030_u:844: na hi ānanda śṛgālaḥ siṃhanādaṃ paribhuṅkte /
S06bsu030_u:850: ye punarānanda samyaksaṃbuddhasya potakāḥ mahābuddhasiṃhena svayaṃ bhuñjānenotpāditāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:854: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatpariśuddheyaṃ tathāgatasya parṣat saṃnipatitā /
S06bsu030_u:857: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - guṇāṃstvaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadaḥ parikīrtayasi /
S06bsu030_u:858: āha - na hyasyā bhagavan parṣado mayā śakyā guṇāḥ parikīrtayitum /
S06bsu030_u:862: na hyasyāḥ parṣado guṇānāmantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantuṃ samyaksaṃbuddhairapi,
S06bsu030_u:866: svenaiva kuśalamūlena iyaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā parṣat saṃnipatitā /
S06bsu030_u:870: avaśyaṃ hi evaṃrūpāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṃnipāto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:871: ye 'pyanye śāradvatīputra buddhā bhagavantaḥ imaṃ sarvasaṃśayocchedanaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:880: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramiteti suvikrāntavikrāmin katamā bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu030_u:912: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin "yadrūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam" iti rūpavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:913: "yathā rūpasya pāraṃ tathā rūpam" iti rūpasvabhāvanirdeśo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:918: "yadvijñānasya pāraṃ na tadvijñānam" iti vijñānavisaṃyogo hyeṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:919: "yathā vijñānasya pāraṃ tathā vijñānam" iti vijñānasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:921: "yacca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ na te sarvadharmāḥ" iti sarvadharmāṇāmeṣa visaṃyogo nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:922: "yathā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ" iti sarvadharmasvabhāvanirdeśa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:931: nāpi prajñāpāramitā rūpasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā /
S06bsu030_u:932: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:933: na vijñānasyādhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā viprakṛṣṭā sthitā //
S06bsu030_u:939: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā //
S06bsu030_u:940: yā punā rūpasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yathāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:942: evaṃ yā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānatathatā avitathathā ananyatathatā yathāvattathātā,
S06bsu030_u:966: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya rūpaṃ gocaraḥ /
S06bsu030_u:967: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:969: agocara iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃjānīte vā paśyati vā /
S06bsu030_u:972: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ na vijñānaṃ (vijñānaṃ)
S06bsu030_u:976: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpasvabhāvaṃ jahāti /
S06bsu030_u:982: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:987: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:989: na vijñānaṃ hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:992: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:994: na vijñānaṃ saṃkliśyate vā vyavadāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:997: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ viśuddhadharmi nāviśuddhadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:998: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1000: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na viśuddhadharmatā nāviśuddhadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1002: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
S06bsu030_u:1004: na vijñānaṃ saṃkrāmati vā avakrāmati vā /
S06bsu030_u:1008: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1010: na vijñānaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1013: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1015: na vijñānaṃ cyavate vā upapadyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1018: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ jāyate vā mriyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1020: na vijñāna jāyate vā mriyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1023: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1024: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1025: na vijñānaṃ saṃsarati vā saṃsaraṇadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1028: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1029: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1030: na vijñānaṃ kṣīyate vā kṣayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1033: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ samudayadharmi na nirodhadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:1038: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamutpādadharmi vā vyayadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1043: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ vipariṇāmadharmi na avipariṇāmadharmi /
S06bsu030_u:1046: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vipariṇāmadharmatā na avipariṇāmadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1048: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1050: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1051: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na nityatā nāpyanityatā,
S06bsu030_u:1053: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1055: na vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1056: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi sukhatā nāpyasukhatā,
S06bsu030_u:1058: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpamātmā vā anātmā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1064: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1066: na vijñānaṃ rāgadharmi vā virāgadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1067: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na rāgadharmatā nāpi virāgadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1069: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1071: na vijñānaṃ dveṣadharmi vā adveṣadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1072: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dveṣadharmatā nāpi vigatadveṣadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1074: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1076: na vijñānaṃ mohadharmi vā vigatamohadharmi vā /
S06bsu030_u:1077: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na mohadharmatā nāpi vigatamohadharmatā,
S06bsu030_u:1079: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1081: na vijñānasya kaścitkartā vā kārayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1084: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1085: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1086: na vijñānasya kaścidutthāpako vā samutthāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1087: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ notthāpanā va samutthāpanā,
S06bsu030_u:1089: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1091: na vijñānasya kaścijjñātā vā jñāpako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1094: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1096: na vijñānasya kaścidvedako vā vedayitā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1099: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1100: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1101: na vijñānasya kaścijjānako vā paśyako vā /
S06bsu030_u:1104: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasyocchedatā vā śāśvatatā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1105: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1109: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya anto vā ananto vā /
S06bsu030_u:1110: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1114: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam /
S06bsu030_u:1117: yacca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dṛṣṭigataṃ na dṛṣṭigataprahāṇam,
S06bsu030_u:1120: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇam /
S06bsu030_u:1121: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1123: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na tṛṣṇā na tṛṣṇāprahāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1125: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1127: na vijñānaṃ kuśalaṃ vā akuśalaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1128: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na kuśalatā nākuśalatā,
S06bsu030_u:1130: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1131: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1132: na vijñānasya gamanaṃ vā āgamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1133: yatra ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na gatirnāgatiḥ prajñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:1135: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ sthitirvā asthitirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1138: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmāraṃ vā pāraṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1139: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpyāratā na pāratā,
S06bsu030_u:1141: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śīlaṃ vā dauḥśīlyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1144: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni anunayo vā pratigho vā /
S06bsu030_u:1147: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dadati vā pratigṛhṇāti vā /
S06bsu030_u:1150: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kṣāntirvā akṣāntirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1153: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vīryaṃ vā kausīdyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1156: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā /
S06bsu030_u:1157: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na samādhirna vikṣiptacittatā,
S06bsu030_u:1159: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni prajñā vā dauṣprajñyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1160: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi prajñatā nāpi dauṣprajñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1162: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāni viparyāsā vā aviparyāsā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1163: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi viparyāsatā nāpyaviparyāsatā,
S06bsu030_u:1166: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni smṛtyupasthānāni vā asmṛtyupasthānāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1169: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni samyakprahāṇāni vā asamyakprahāṇāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1170: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi samyakprahāṇatā nāpyasamyakprahāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1172: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni ṛddhipādā vā apramāṇāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1173: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi ṛddhipādatā nāpyapramāṇatā,
S06bsu030_u:1175: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni indriyāṇi vā balabodhyaṅgamārgaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1176: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nendriyatā na balabodhyaṅgamārgatā,
S06bsu030_u:1178: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni vidyā vā vimuktirvā /
S06bsu030_u:1179: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na vidyatā na vimuktitā,
S06bsu030_u:1181: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñā vā nāpyanabhijñā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1182: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattitā nāpyabhijñatā nāpyanabhijñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1184: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni śūnyatā vā animittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1185: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ na śūnyatā nānimittatā nāpraṇihitatā,
S06bsu030_u:1187: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃskṛtāni vā asaṃskṛtāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1188: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃskṛtatā nāpyasaṃskṛtatā,
S06bsu030_u:1190: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṅgo vā asaṅgo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1191: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṅgatā nāpyasaṅgatā,
S06bsu030_u:1193: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1194: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi jñānatā nāpyajñānatā,
S06bsu030_u:1196: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni manyanā vā spandanā vā prapañcanā vā /
S06bsu030_u:1200: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃjñā nāsaṃjñā /
S06bsu030_u:1201: yā ca rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nāpi saṃjñatā nāpyasaṃjñatā,
S06bsu030_u:1203: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni upaśāntāni vā anupaśāntāni vā /
S06bsu030_u:1206: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ nirvṛttirna anirvṛttiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1209: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1211: yā punaḥ pañcaskandhānāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1223: yā punaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśattṛṣṇācaritābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1229: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1231: yā punaḥ pañcānāmabhijñānāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1233: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yaḥ saṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kuśalākuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1235: yā punasteṣāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1239: yā punaḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgābhinirvṛttiparyāpannanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1244: yā punaścaturāryasatyanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1248: yā punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaviśuddhinirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1250: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yo 'saṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ lokottarāṇāmaniśritānāmanāsravānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1252: yā punarasaṃskṛtaparyāpannānāṃ lokottarāṇāmaniśritānāmanāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1256: yā punaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādānabhisaṃskṛtadharmanirdeśasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1264: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1267: na kāmadhātu - na rūpadhātu - nārūpadhātuparyāpannā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1273: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasmiṃściddharme paryāpannā nāpyaparyāpannā /
S06bsu030_u:1274: yā ca paryāpannāparyāpannānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:1277: na hyete suvikrāntavikrāmin tathā dharmā yathā bālapṛthagjanairupalabdhāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1284: na khalu punariyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya hānāya vā vivṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1285: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā,
S06bsu030_u:1346: prativedhāya vā aprativedhāya vā pratyupasthitā iti //
S06bsu030_u:1353: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapnadarśī puruṣaḥ svapnasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1360: tadyathāpiu nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin svapno na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1361: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1362: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyādarśī puruṣo māyāsvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1367: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin māyā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1368: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttaye pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1369: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāsadarśī puruṣaḥ pratibhāsasvabhāvanirdeśaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1375: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratibhāso na kasyaciddharmasya nirdaśanena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1376: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1377: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcidarśī puruṣo marīcidarśanaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1382: na ca punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvanirdeśaḥ kaścitsaṃvidyate /
S06bsu030_u:1383: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin marīcirna kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1384: evameva prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1385: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin pratiśrutkāgocarasthaḥ puruṣaḥ pratiśrutkāyāśca śabdaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06bsu030_u:1390: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśaśravaṇāya gacchati anyatra yadābhibhāṣyate tadā ājñāyate,
S06bsu030_u:1393: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍadarśī puruṣaḥ phenapiṇḍasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1394: na ca phenapiṇḍasvabhāva upalabhyate adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā,
S06bsu030_u:1398: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin phenapiṇḍo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:1400: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudadarśī puruṣo budbudasvabhāvaṃ ca nirdiśati,
S06bsu030_u:1405: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin budbudo na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1406: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya abhinirvṛttisvabhāvena pratyupasthitā //
S06bsu030_u:1407: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣaḥ kadalyāḥ sāraṃ paryeṣamāṇo nopalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1408: atha ca tasyāḥ patraiḥ kāryaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:1409: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāraṃ na saṃvidyate,
S06bsu030_u:1411: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣa ākāśanidarśanena vyavahārati,
S06bsu030_u:1415: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin nākāśaṃ na vyavahriyate,
S06bsu030_u:1416: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate /
S06bsu030_u:1418: na ca kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena vā pariniṣpattyā vā vyavahriyate //
S06bsu030_u:1419: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin chāyeti cātapaśceti vyavahriyate,
S06bsu030_u:1420: na ca tau kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitau,
S06bsu030_u:1425: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin maṇiratnamuttaptaṃ mahatāvabhāsena pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:1426: na ca so 'vabhāso 'dhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1428: na ca so 'vabhāso 'adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā darśanamupaiti //
S06bsu030_u:1429: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin tailapradyotasya dhmāyato nāsyārciṣo muhūrtamapi saṃtiṣṭhante,
S06bsu030_u:1435: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā ca nirdiṣṭā,
S06bsu030_u:1467: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra indrāyudhaṃ nānāraṅgavicitraṃ ca saṃdṛśyate,
S06bsu030_u:1471: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśe na jātu kenacitpañcāṅgulipariniṣpattirdṛṣṭapūrvā,
S06bsu030_u:1473: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - durdṛśeyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1474: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1476: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra nāsyāṃ kaścidupalabhyate yo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1478: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1496: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputra bhagavantametadavocat - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattaye pratyupasthitā na nirodhāya /
S06bsu030_u:1497: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya utpādāya vā pariniṣpattaye vā nirodhāya vā ātmatāyai vā anātmatāyai vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1498: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1499: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra nirārambaṇāḥ sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1500: tathā hi ta eva dharmā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu030_u:1502: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya hānaye vā vṛddhaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1503: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā [Vaidya_29] na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1504: yo dharmo hīyate vā vardhate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1505: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya samatikramāya pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1506: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1508: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya apacayāya vā upacayāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1509: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1510: yasya apacayo vā upacayo vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1511: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1512: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1514: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya naye vā vinaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1515: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1516: yo dharmo netavyo vā vinetavyo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1517: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya upakārāya vā apakārāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1518: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1519: yasya upakāraṃ vā apakāraṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1520: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃbhavāya vā asaṃbhavāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1521: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1523: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃprayogāya vā viprayogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1524: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1525: yo dharmaḥ saṃprayujyate vā viprayujyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:1526: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsāya vā asaṃvāsāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1527: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1529: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya pravṛttaye vā apravṛtaye vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1530: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1532: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya kriyayā vā karaṇena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1533: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1534: yasya dharmasya kriyā vā karaṇaṃ vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1535: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya samatayā vā viṣamatayā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1536: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1537: yo dharmaḥ samo vā viṣamo vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1538: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā asaṃgrahāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1539: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1540: yo dharmaḥ saṃgrahītavyo vā utsraṣṭavyo vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1541: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kenacitkāryeṇa pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1542: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1563: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro gambhīro vipulo 'prameyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1569: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra samudro mahāsāgaraḥ sarvaratnasaṃnicayo 'prameyaratnabharito mahāratnaparipūrṇaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1571: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1572: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:1574: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1575: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1576: yasya dharmasya jñānaṃ vā ajñānaṃ vā syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1577: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ārakṣāyai vā guptyai vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1578: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1579: yasya dharmasya ārakṣāṃ vā guptiṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1580: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃgrahāya vā parigrahāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1581: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1582: yasya dharmasya saṃgrahaṃ vā parigrahaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1583: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya niśrayeṇa vā aniśrayeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1584: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1585: yasya dharmasya niśrayaṃ vā aniśrayaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1586: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya ālayena vā vilayena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1587: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1588: yasmin ālayaṃ vā vilayaṃ vā kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1589: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya abhiniveśena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1590: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1592: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya adhyavasānena pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1593: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1596: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃvāsena vā asaṃvāsena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1597: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1599: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdhinā vā visaṃdhinā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1600: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1601: yo dharmaḥ saṃdhātavyo vā visaṃdhātavyo vā /
S06bsu030_u:1602: āha - neya bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya rāgeṇa vā virāgeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1603: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1604: yasmin dharme rajyeta vā virajyeta vā /
S06bsu030_u:1605: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya dveṣeṇa vā adveṣeṇa vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1606: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1607: yo dharma sadveṣo vā vigatadveṣo vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1608: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya mohena vā vigatamohena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1609: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate,
S06bsu030_u:1610: yo dharmo mūḍho vā syādvigatamoho vā /
S06bsu030_u:1611: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya jñāpayitrī vā ajñāpayitrī vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1612: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1613: yaṃ dharmaṃ jānīyāt yasya vā dharmasya jñāpayitrī vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1614: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtyā vā aprakṛtyā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1615: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya prakṛtiṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:1616: āha - neyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya śuddhyā vā viśuddhyā vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1617: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:1623: saṃskārapariśuddhito vijñānapariśuddhito nāmarūpapariśuddhitaḥ ṣaḍāyatanapariśuddhitaḥ pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:1653: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat prakṛtipariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1656: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya rūpapariniṣpattyā vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:1658: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ samanupaśyati yasmin pratihanyeta /
S06bsu030_u:1662: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa sārdhaṃ samavasaret /
S06bsu030_u:1664: āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa prajñapyeta /
S06bsu030_u:1666: (āha - tathā hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamupalabhate yena dharmeṇa sādhāraṇā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1679: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1694: na hyasyāḥ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāyā anto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu030_u:1700: abdhātvanantatayā tejodhātvanantatayā vāyudhātvanantatayā vijñānadhātvanantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1702: na hi śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā deśasthā na pradeśasthā /
S06bsu030_u:1710: dānānantatayā śīlānantatayā kṣāntyanantatayā vīryānantatayā dhyānānantatayā prajñānantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1714: abhijñāparyantatayā [Vaidya_34] vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñānadarśanāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1715: pṛthagjanadharmāparyantatayā śrāvakadharmāparyantatayā pratyekabuddhadharmāparyantatayā buddhadharmāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1716: vidyāparyantatayā vimuktyaparyantatayā vimuktijñā[nadarśa]nāparyantatayā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāparyantatā anugantavyā /
S06bsu030_u:1722: evamukte āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kīdṛśānāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaḥ?
S06bsu030_u:1723: bhagavānāha - ye te śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā dharmamapi nopalabhante prāgevādharmam,
S06bsu030_u:1725: śīlamapi nopalabhante na manyante prāgeva dauḥśīlyam,
S06bsu030_u:1728: anadhyavasitāśca kāye jīvite ca prāgeva bāhyeṣu vastuṣu,
S06bsu030_u:1732: teṣāṃ śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu viṣayaśca gatiśca,
S06bsu030_u:1733: sarvaviṣayā aviṣayā iti ca yeṣāṃ parijānante (parijñānam?)
S06bsu030_u:1742: yeṣāṃ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo gatiśca /
S06bsu030_u:1743: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra asyāṃ parṣadi samanupaśyāmi ekamapi bodhisattvam,
S06bsu030_u:1744: yasya naiṣu dharmeṣu viṣayo vā adhimuktirvā,
S06bsu030_u:1745: yo vā eṣu dharmeṣu sākāṅkṣo vā savicikitso vā /
S06bsu030_u:1746: niṣkāṅkṣeyaṃ śāradvatīputra parṣadeṣu dharmeṣu nirvicikitsā nirvaimatikā /
S06bsu030_u:1747: nāsti śāradvatīputra eṣāṃ bodhisatvānāmeṣu dharmeṣu vimatiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1748: vimatisamuddhātāya śāradvatīputra ete satpuruṣāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sthitāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1749: niḥsaṃśayā hyete śāradvatīputra eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu dharmeṣu saṃśayasamatikrāntāḥ //
S06bsu030_u:1750: ye 'pi te śāradvatīputra paścime kāle paścime samaye imāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śroṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1754: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra parīttakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmeṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktiṃ vadāmi /
S06bsu030_u:1757: nāpi te śāradvatīputra sattvāḥ parīttakuśalamūlasamanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1758: yeṣāmiyaṃ dharmadeśanāṃ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati kimaṅga punarye udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti /
S06bsu030_u:1761: evaṃ ca te siṃhanādaṃ nadiṣyanti yathāhametarhi siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi astambhitanādaṃ mahāpuruṣanādaṃ svayaṃbhūnādam /
S06bsu030_u:1762: ye eṣu dharmeṣvatyantaśaḥ śraddhāṃ janayitvā chandaṃ janayiṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu030_u:1766: ya imān gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā prītiṃ ca vindanti,
S06bsu030_u:1770: ye gambhīrān dharmān śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayanti,
S06bsu030_u:1772: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra tān sattvān mahāsaṃsārasaṃprasthitāniti vadāmi yeṣāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśaḥ śravaṇapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:1774: paṭhiṣyanti adhimokṣyanti udāraṃ ca prītisaumanasyaṃ janayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:1775: eṣu dharmeṣu chandaṃ janayiṣyanti punaḥ punaḥ śravaṇāyāpi,
S06bsu030_u:1776: kaḥ punarvādaḥ uddeṣṭuṃ vā svādhyātuṃ vā parebhyo deśayituṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:1777: vyākaromyahaṃ śāradvatīputra anavakrāntaniyāmān aniyatān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhauḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1778: nāhaṃ śāradvatīputra hīnadharmasamanvāgatānāṃ sattvānāmagrato dharmeṣvavakāśaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu030_u:1780: yadbhūyasā ca sattvā hīnādhimuktikā hīnadharmasamanvāgatā akṛtakalyāṇāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1782: ye punaste śāradvatīputra udārāḥ sattvā udāradharmādhimuktā mahāyānasaṃprasthitāḥ supariprāptakāryāḥ susaṃnāhasaṃnaddhāḥ suvicitrārthā mahāmārgeṇa saṃprasthitā aviṣameṇa ṛjunā,
S06bsu030_u:1783: agahanena samena apagatakhāṇukaṇṭakena apagataśvabhraprapātena śucinā apagatakilbiṣeṇa akuṭilena avaṅkena,
S06bsu030_u:1784: ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitā lokasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya va devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:1788: teṣāṃ śāradvatīputra tathārūpāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmidaṃ mahādhanam /
S06bsu030_u:1789: ta eva ca śāradvatīputra mahāsattvā asya dharmaratnasya pratyeṣakāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1792: na hi śāradvatīputra akṛtapuṇyānāṃ sattvānāmakṛtakalyāṇānāṃ hīnādhimuktikānāṃ śraddhāvihīnānāmasminnudāre dhane 'dhimuktirjāyate /
S06bsu030_u:1793: etacca me śāradvatīputra saṃdhāya bhāṣitam - dhātuśaḥ satvāḥ saṃsyandanti hīnādhimuktikā hīnādhimuktikaiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1795: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃgocarā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu030_u:1796: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputrametadavocat - anantaviṣayagocarā śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:1801: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kvacitsaṃdṛśyete,
S06bsu030_u:1803: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā na kvaciddharme saṃdṛśyate,
S06bsu030_u:1805: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca agrāhyāpariniṣpattito na varṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1806: evameva śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā agrāhyāniṣpattito na [Vaidya_36] kenacidvarṇanimittena saṃkhyāṃ gacchati vā upaiti vā /
S06bsu030_u:1807: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattidarśanenopayātau,
S06bsu030_u:1811: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhātuśca vāyudhātuśca na kasyaciddharmasya pariciṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1812: evameva śāradavtīputra prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopaiti /
S06bsu030_u:1816: tadyathāpi nāma śāradvatīputra ākāśadhāturvāyudhātudhca na kasyaciddharmasya pariniṣpattilakṣaṇenopagacchataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1827: na ca asaṅgasya lakṣaṇaṃ na nimittam /
S06bsu030_u:1832: na hi śāradvatīputra saṅge saṅgo cidyate,
S06bsu030_u:1857: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāmetadasaṅgalakṣaṇanidarśanaṃ kṛtam /
S06bsu030_u:1877: yo 'bhūtaḥ, tatra bhūtasya pariniṣpattirvā [Vaidya_37] lakṣaṇaṃ vā nāsti /
S06bsu030_u:1894: n ahi śāradvtīputra gocaranidarśanalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate /
S06bsu030_u:1895: viṣaya iti śāradvatīputra aviṣaya e ṣa dharmāṇām eṣā yathābhūtatā,
S06bsu030_u:1905: eṣvevaṃrūpeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu na bahavaḥ sahāyakāḥ pratilabhyante /
S06bsu030_u:1908: na hyeṣu śāradvatīputra dharmeṣu kaścidanyaḥ sahāyaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1910: teṣāmapi tāvacchāradvatīputra dṛṣṭisaṃpannānāmeṣu dharmeṣu caritānāṃ saṃśayaḥ syāt /
S06bsu030_u:1911: niḥsaṃśayaḥ śāradvatīputra kāyasākṣī ca bodhisattvaśca pratilabdhakṣāntikaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1913: nāyaṃ śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hīnādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati /
S06bsu030_u:1917: kṛtādhikārā buddheṣu bhagavatsu bodhāyāvaropitabuddhabījā buddhayānasamārūḍhā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmāsannasthāyino yoniśaḥ praśnapṛcchakāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1926: atha ca śāradvatīputra vyākṛtā eva te mantavyāḥ saṃmukhavyākaraṇena /
S06bsu030_u:1927: na hi śāradvatīputra aparipakvakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ sūtrāntaḥ śrotrapathamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:1928: kimaṅga punaryadetaṃ sūtrāntaṃ pratilabheran vā lekhayeyurvā ārādhayeyurvā uddiśeyurvā dhyāyeran vā,
S06bsu030_u:1932: ya imaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu030_u:1933: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra [Vaidya_38] uttaptakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāmayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastaṃ gamiṣyati /
S06bsu030_u:1934: api tu khalu punaḥ śāradvatīputra ārocayāmi te,
S06bsu030_u:1936: na tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānīyena vā śrāvakayānīyena vā imān dharmān pratilabhya alpotsukena bhavitavyam,
S06bsu030_u:1937: kusīdena vā middhabahulena vā asaṃprajñena vā anupasthitasmṛtinā vā vikṣiptacittena vā āmiṣagṛddhena vā lolena vā mukhareṇa vā tundena vā pragalbhena vā prākṛtendriyeṇa vā /
S06bsu030_u:1938: kiṃcāpi śāradvatīputra kuśalamūlāni kṛtāni na visaṃvādayanti /
S06bsu030_u:1939: api tu khalu imān dharmān labdhvā bodhisattvena bhūyasyā mātrayā apramādaśca vīryaṃ ca utsāhaśca chandaśca akausīdyaṃ ca saṃvṛtendriyatā ca amukharatā cāsevitavyā,
S06bsu030_u:1943: yadbodhisattvo vā śrāvakayāniko vā evaṃrūpān dharmān śrutvā pramādamāpadyeta,
S06bsu030_u:1950: nāpi tena ime evaṃrūpā dharmāḥ śrutā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1953: na hi śāradvatīputra vipratipannena ayaṃ dharmaḥ śruto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:1958: kṣāntisaṃpannasya śāradvatīputra pudgalasya pratipattisthitasya na bhūyo 'pāyagamanaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:1963: yaḥ śāradvatīputra eṣu dharmeṣu pariniṣpannaḥ śikṣito labdhakṣāntirna bhūyasā apāyagamanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kuryāt /
S06bsu030_u:1964: na cāsya bhūyaḥ kausīdyaṃ vā hīnabhāgīyaṃ vā bhavet /
S06bsu030_u:1968: parijñāto hi śāradvatīputra tena bhavati saṃkleśaśca vyavadānaṃ ca,
S06bsu030_u:1969: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tena yathābhūtaṃ bhavati - sarvadharmā viparyāsasamutthitā abhūtā iti /
S06bsu030_u:1970: sa evaṃ samyagdarśī kṣāntisaṃpanno bhavati sūrato 'mandavān (?)
S06bsu030_u:1972: devā api śāradvatīputra tathārūpebhyaḥ spṛhayanti prāgeva manuṣyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1973: devānāmapi te tathārūpāḥ sattvāḥ spṛhaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1974: devānāmapi te satkārārhā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyāṇām /
S06bsu030_u:1975: devairapi te rakṣaṇīyā bhavanti prāgeva manuṣyaiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:1983: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāradvatīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kimāyuṣman subhūte tūṣṇīṃbhāvenātināmayasi?
S06bsu030_u:1984: kiṃ na pratibhāti te prajñāpāramitāmārabhya ayaṃ śāstā svayaṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:1985: iyaṃ ca parṣad bhājanībhūtā gambhīrāyā dharmadeśanāyāḥ?
S06bsu030_u:1988_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramevamāha - nāhaṃ tamāyuṣman dharmaṃ
S06bsu030_u:1988_1: samanupaśyāmi yaṃ me ārabhya pratibhāyāt - na cāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu030_u:1993: evaṃ samanupaśyan nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yacca pratibhāyāt,
S06bsu030_u:2003: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā śakyodāhārtuṃ vā,
S06bsu030_u:2008: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu030_u:2009: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā atītalakṣaṇā vā śakyā nirdeṣṭum,
S06bsu030_u:2011: alakṣaṇā avyavahārā eṣā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:2014: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra yadrūpasya atītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā,
S06bsu030_u:2016: nāpi yadvedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāmatītalakṣaṇaṃ vā anāgatalakṣaṇaṃ vā pratyutpannalakṣaṇaṃ vā sā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu030_u:2017: yacca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannarūpalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2019: yā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2021: yā ca āyuṣman śāradvatīputra atītānāgatapratyutpannasya rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānalakṣaṇasya tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā yāvattathatā,
S06bsu030_u:2022: sā na śakyā prajñapayituṃ vā udāhartuṃ vā abhilapituṃ vā vākkarmaṇā vā visarjayitum /
S06bsu030_u:2025: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nirdeśalakṣaṇena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2049: sā na kasyaciddarśanamupaiti - iyaṃ vā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu030_u:2053: nāhamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitā nirdiśyeta /
S06bsu030_u:2054: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya nidarśanamupaiti vā utpaśyati vā /
S06bsu030_u:2055: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya nidarśanamupaiti,
S06bsu030_u:2061: yāpi sā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñā lokottarā nirvedhagāminī,
S06bsu030_u:2063: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo nidarśanaṃ nopaiti kasyaciddharmasya,
S06bsu030_u:2065: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmanayaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu030_u:2067: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2069: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2075: na saṃkleśasya na vyavadānasya saṃdarśanena pratyupasthitā,
S06bsu030_u:2104: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya jñānena vā ajñānena vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2105: nāpyanutpādajñānasya vā kṣayajñānasya vā nirodhajñānasya vā saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2106: nāpi nirvāṇasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2107: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra na kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā pratyupasthitā nidarśanena vā,
S06bsu030_u:2109: api tu khalu āyuṣman śāradvatīputra ya evaṃ nirdeśamavabudhyate - na prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya saṃdarśanena vā nidarśanena vā pratyupasthiteti,
S06bsu030_u:2112: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā kasyaciddharmasya yogāya vā viyogāya vā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu030_u:2114: na hi āyuṣman śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā rūpaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2115: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2117: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2118: na pṛthivīdhātuṃ nābdhātuṃ na tejodhātuṃ na vāyudhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2119: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ na dharmadhātuṃ nākāśadhātuṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2120: na dānaṃ na mātsaryaṃ na śīlaṃ na dauḥśīlyaṃ na kṣāntiṃ na vyāpādaṃ na vīryaṃ na kausīdyaṃ na dhyānaṃ na vikṣepaṃ na prajñāṃ na dauṣprajñyaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2121: na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇāni na ṛddhipādāpramāṇāni nendriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattyabhijñāḥ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2122: na mārgaṃ na mārgaphalaṃ na duḥkhaṃ na duḥkhasamudayaṃ na nirodhaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2123: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na bodhisattvabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2124: na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na bodhisattvadharmān na buddhadharmān saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2126: nāsaṅgatānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ na nirvāṇaṃ saṃyojayati na visaṃyojayati /
S06bsu030_u:2127: tadyathā āyuṣman śāradvatīputra dharmo na kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya vā visaṃyogāya vā pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2129: idamāyuṣman śāradvatīputra arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannahamevaṃ vadāmi - nāhaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo me dharmaḥ pratibhāyāt,
S06bsu030_u:2138: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - iha khalu suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna kvaciddharme carati /
S06bsu030_u:2147: nāpi viparyāse vā abhūte vā caran bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2154: ye ca na tathā yathā gṛhītāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2156: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viparyāse vā abhūte vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:2162: sā na śakyā ādarśayitum - iyaṃ vā bodhisattvacaryā,
S06bsu030_u:2167: sarvacaryāvinivṛttaye hi bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti pṛthagjanacaryāvinivṛttaye śrāvakacaryāvinivṛtaye pratyekabuddhacaryāvinivṛttaye /
S06bsu030_u:2169: teṣvapi bodhisattvā na caranti nābhiniviśante - ime vā te bodhisattvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2182: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmaḥ kalpo vā vikalpo vā /
S06bsu030_u:2187: yo naiva ante na anante carati,
S06bsu030_u:2189: madhyamapi suvikrāntavikrāmin samanupaśyan madhye caran anta eva carati /
S06bsu030_u:2190: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin madhyasya kāciccaryā (vā kiṃci)
S06bsu030_u:2193: na ca suvikrāntavikrāmin āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ kasyaciddharmasyopalambhena pratyupasthitaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2195: api tu yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:2197: sa sarvadharmān na bhāvayanna vibhāvayan bhāvanāsamatikrānto dharmasamatāmanuprāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:2202: vibhāvito hi sa mārgo na bhāvito na vibhāvitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2208: sacetkhalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bhāvanā syādvibhāvanā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2211: vibhāvaneti suvikrāntavikrāmin vigatā asyāṃ bhāvaneti vibhāvanā,
S06bsu030_u:2219: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin viparyāso viparyāsaṃ samutthāpayati /
S06bsu030_u:2236: sarvā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin caryā sā caryāsamutthānā /
S06bsu030_u:2243: acaryeti suvikrāntavikrāmin yanna kvaciddharme carati na vicarati na caryālakṣaṇaṃ saṃdarśayati,
S06bsu030_u:2247: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2254: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaścakṣurārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2261: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2269: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāmarūpārambaṇe caraṃścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2279: parijñātā hi taiḥ sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca - abhūtaiṣā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ceti /
S06bsu030_u:2280: yaiśca abhūtā sattvasaṃjñā ca ātmasaṃjñā ca jñātā,
S06bsu030_u:2285_0: ye na suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā jīvasaṃjñāyāṃ vā poṣapuruṣapudgalamanujamānavotthāpakasamutthāpakakārakakārayitṛvedakavedayitṛsaṃjñāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:2291: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā viparyāsairvā dṛṣṭigatairvā nīvaraṇairvā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2297: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pratītyasamutpādārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2301: yā ca parijñā pratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādārambaṇasya ca,
S06bsu030_u:2304: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kāmadhātvārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2311: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2317: na [Vaidya_45] hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2323: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā aviparyāsasamyakprahāṇasmṛtyupasthānāpramāṇārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2329: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā indriyabalabodhyaṅgadhyānasamādhisamāpattyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2335: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2342: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā vidyāvimuktyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2348: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā anutpādārambaṇe vā kṣayārambaṇe vā anabhisaṃskārārambaṇe vā carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2354: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2360: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2366: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhadharmārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2372: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin nirvāṇārambaṇe bodhisattvāścarantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2378: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā lakṣaṇapariśuddhyārambaṇe carantaścaranti prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2393: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo rūpārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi na carati /
S06bsu030_u:2400: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na cakṣurārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:2406: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyadharmārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2411: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nāmarūpārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2416: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātmasattvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2421: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na jīvabhavapudgalakārakakārayitrutthāpakasamutthāpakavedakavedayitṛdraṣṭrārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2426: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na viparyāsadṛṣṭigatārambaṇapariśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2431: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na nīvaraṇārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2434: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na pratītyasamutpādārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2437: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kāmadhāturūpadhātvārūpyadhātvārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2440: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na dānamātsaryaśīladauḥśīlyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2443: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kṣāntivyāpādavīryakausīdyadhyānavikṣepaprajñādauṣprajñyārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2446: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nātītānāgatapratyutpannārambaṇaviśuddhapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2449: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nāsaṅgāvaraṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2452: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo nābhijñārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2455: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na sarvajñatārambaṇaviśuddhāvapi carati /
S06bsu030_u:2462: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvārambaṇaprakṛtipariśuddhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:2463: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ idaṃ rūpamiti na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu030_u:2467: sa evaṃ rūpamasamanupaśyan na rūpamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2477: sa evaṃ vijñānamasamanupaśyan na vijñānamutkṣipati na nikṣipati,
S06bsu030_u:2482: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamatītamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2502: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasamudaye carati,
S06bsu030_u:2528: sarvāṇyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin manyitāni spanditāni prapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni /
S06bsu030_u:2533: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ sarvāṇyetāni manyitaspanditaprapañcitāni tṛṣṇāgatāni jñātvā sarvājñānasamuddhātān na kaṃciddharmaṃ manyante,
S06bsu030_u:2536: te anālayā asaṃyogā avisaṃyogā na kvacidutthāpayanti,
S06bsu030_u:2538: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvamanyanāsamuddhātaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ //
S06bsu030_u:2539: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyaṃ caran na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:2554: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ etāni sarvāṇi vitarkitāni vicaritāni caritavicaritāni jñātvā sarvacaryāsamuddhātāya sarvacaryāparijñāyai prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:2556: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo bhagavantometadavocat - acintyeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2598: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitācaryā cittajanikā,
S06bsu030_u:2602: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin yā cittasya prakṛtiḥ sā utpadyate jā jāyate vā /
S06bsu030_u:2606: na punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā jānanti vivṛtaṃ cittamiti /
S06bsu030_u:2646: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ imānevaṃrūpānabhiniveśān sattvānāṃ viparyāsacittajān samanupaśyan na kvacidviparyāse cittamutpādayati /
S06bsu030_u:2652: tatra bodhisattvo 'pyārambaṇaṃ prajānannapi cittasyotpattiṃ prajānāti - kutaścittamutpadyate?
S06bsu030_u:2654: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ārambaṇaṃ pratītya cittamutpadyate iti /
S06bsu030_u:2655: sa ārambaṇaṃ parijñāya na cittamutpādayati nāpi nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2656: tasya taccittaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ bhavati asaṃkliṣṭaṃ kamanīyaṃ pariśuddham /
S06bsu030_u:2657: sa cittānutpādasthito na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati na nirodhayati /
S06bsu030_u:2661: tasyaivaṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu030_u:2669: atha tāmapi prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati nopalabhate - ahaṃ carāmi prajñāpāramitāyāmiti na carati,
S06bsu030_u:2671: evamukte suvikrāntavikrāmī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - anuttareyaṃ caryā bhagavan bodhisattvasya yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2672: prabhāsvareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2673: niruttareyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2674: atyadbhuteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā /
S06bsu030_u:2675_0: anavakrānteyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā māreṇa vā māraparṣadbhirvā anyairvā
S06bsu030_u:2676: sarvalokābhyudayacaryeyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya caryā yaduta prajñāpāramitācaryā //
S06bsu030_u:2677: evamukte bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - evametat suvikrāntavikrāmin, evametat /
S06bsu030_u:2678: anavakrāntacaryeyaṃ bodhisattvasya māreṇa vā mārakāyikairvā devaputrairmāraparṣadā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2684: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ caryā śrāvakayānīyānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānīyānāṃ vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:2685: na teṣāṃ kaścidvyavahāro 'bhaviṣyat - śrāvakayānīyā vā pratyekabuddhayānīyā veti /
S06bsu030_u:2688: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin na śrāvakayānīyānāṃ va pratyekabuddhayānīyānāmiyaṃ caryā,
S06bsu030_u:2689: tasmātte na bodhisattvā iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu030_u:2693: evaṃ carantaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvāḥ kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu030_u:2694: anabhisaṃbuddhā eva yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ praṇidhānavaśena ca buddhānāṃ ca bhagavatāmadhiṣṭhānavaśena /
S06bsu030_u:2695: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śrāvakayānikānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā caturvaiśāradyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:2702: ābhiścatasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ samanvāgatā anabhisaṃbuddhā eva praṇidhānavaśena vaiśāradyāni pratigṛhṇanti /
S06bsu030_u:2703: tathāgatā api tān kuśalamūlasamanvāgatāniti viditvā prajñāpāramitābhūmyanuprāptāniti viditvā adhitiṣṭhanti caturvaiśāradyena /
S06bsu030_u:2704: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'nuprāptukāmena kṣipraṃ caturvaiśāradyakuśalena bhavitukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ caritavyam //
S06bsu030_u:2705: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāṇāṃ hetuṃ ca samudayaṃ ca astaṃgamaṃ ca nirodhaṃ ca pravidhyati na kaṃciddharmam,
S06bsu030_u:2708: teṣāṃ hetusamudayanirodhamārgalakṣaṇaṃ prajānan na rūpaṃ prabhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2715: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2716: na sattvadhātuṃ nātmadhātuṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2717: nocchedadṛṣṭiṃ na śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2721: va vīryakausīdyaṃ na dhyānavikṣepaṃ na prajñādauṣprajñyaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2726: nānutpādajñānaṃ na kṣayajñānaṃ nābhisaṃskārajñānaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2728: na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2729: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān (na bodhisattvadharmabuddhadharmān)
S06bsu030_u:2731: na śamathaṃ na vidarśanāṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati /
S06bsu030_u:2767: viparyāsasamutthitatayā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sattvā bhāvayanti ca vibhāvayanti ca /
S06bsu030_u:2773: yasmin samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva evaṃ dharmeṣu dharmānudarśī viharan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃciddharmaṃ bhāvayati na vibhāvayati,
S06bsu030_u:2775: evaṃ carata evaṃ viharataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2777: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na rūpasaṃprayoganimittaṃ cittamutpadyate /
S06bsu030_u:2803: so 'nayā cittaviśuddhyā samanvāgataḥ sattvān maitryā spharati karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā /
S06bsu030_u:2808: tasyaibhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kṣipraṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2809: sa evaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na rūpamupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2810: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:2813: na kāmadhātuṃ na rūpadhātuṃ nārūpyadhātumupaiti, nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2825: nātmadhātuṃ na sattvadhātuṃ na dharmadhātumupaiti nopādatte /
S06bsu030_u:2836: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kaściddharma upādātavyo nāpi kenacidupādattaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2848: udakacandrasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā agrāhyatāmupādāya indrāyudharaṅgasadṛśā hi sarvadharmā asatparikalpanatāmupādāya /
S06bsu030_u:2851: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ sarvadharmān samanupaśyan na kaṃciddharmamupaiti nopādatte,
S06bsu030_u:2854: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaśraddadhānatā anadhiṣṭhānatā anadhyavasānatā anabhiṣvaṅgatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2855: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati //
S06bsu030_u:2856: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo na rūpe śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2858: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu030_u:2859: na vijñāne śikṣate na vijñānasamatikramāya śikṣate /
S06bsu030_u:2862: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2869: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānānāṃ saṃkrāntaye śikṣate nāvakrāntaye,
S06bsu030_u:2871: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpanityatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:2880: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpātītārambaṇe carati,
S06bsu030_u:2888: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'tītaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyam,
S06bsu030_u:2891: anāgataṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yadatītaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2893: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyākāreṇa śāntākāreṇa anātmākāreṇa pratyavekṣate - yatpratyutpannaṃ tacchūnyaṃ śāntamanātmeti /
S06bsu030_u:2895: atītaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena [Vaidya_55] vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2897: anāgataṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā vā,
S06bsu030_u:2899: pratyutpannaṃ śūnyaṃ śāntamanātmanā vā anātmīyena vā anityena vā adhruveṇa vā aśāśvatena vā vipariṇāmadharmiṇā veti,
S06bsu030_u:2901: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2902: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
S06bsu030_u:2905: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin evaṃ caran bodhisattvo na rūpamālambate,
S06bsu030_u:2906: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06bsu030_u:2949: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ kiṃcidgrahaṇaṃ saṃvidyate yatraiṣāmālambanaṃ bhaveta /
S06bsu030_u:2968: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imānādīnavān saṃpaśyan na kaṃciddharmamālambate /
S06bsu030_u:2970: sa nāpyudgrahāya nāgrahāya sthitaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ tāmapi nirālambanavaśikatāṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:2971: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśate nābhivadati,
S06bsu030_u:2973: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmālambanavisaṃyogaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:2974: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya carataḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūtiṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:2975: na cāsya māraḥ pāpīyān antarāyaṃ śaknoti kartum,
S06bsu030_u:2979: na cāsya te 'vatāraṃ labhante yatrāsya viheṭhān kuryuḥ,
S06bsu030_u:2987: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na rūpavikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2988: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānakalpanāyāṃ sthito bhavati na vikalpanāyām /
S06bsu030_u:2990: evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāni kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3015: na pṛthagjanadharmān na śrāvakadharmān na pratyekabuddhadharmān na buddhadharmān kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3016: [Vaidya_57] na pṛthagjanabhūmiṃ na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ na buddhabhūmiṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3021: na muktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3038: , tatra nāsti anto vā madhyaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:3039: madhyamiti suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpayataḥ sa evānto bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3043: yatra punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin na kalpanā na vikalpanā,
S06bsu030_u:3047: anto hi suvikrāntavikrāmin kalpo vikalpo vikalpasamutthitaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3059: yo duḥkhaṃ naiva kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06bsu030_u:3062: sa evaṃ paśyan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kaṃciddharmaṃ kalpayati na vikalpayati /
S06bsu030_u:3065: evaṃ carataḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3070: mārasya ca pāpīyasaḥ parājayaṃ karoti dhyāmīkaroti ca /
S06bsu030_u:3106: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ ebhiścānyaiśca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati yeṣāṃ guṇānāṃ na paryantaḥ śakyo 'dhigantum //
S06bsu030_u:3107: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran nendriyavikalo bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3129: evaṃ ca mārasya pāpīyaso bhavati - atikrāntaviṣayo 'yaṃ mama,
S06bsu030_u:3135: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān śocati krandati paridevate - alpapakṣīkariṣyati ayaṃ bodhisattvo māmiti /
S06bsu030_u:3138: yasmiṃśca samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3142: mārāśca pāpīyāṃso duḥkhitā durmanaso bhavanti śokaśalyasamarpitā mahāśokaśalyaviddhāḥ - ativāhayiṣyatyayaṃ bata sattvānasmadviṣayāt,
S06bsu030_u:3152: imamarthavaśaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin saṃpaśyantaste mārā duḥkhitā bhavanti durmanasaḥ śokaśalyaviddhāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3153: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin puruṣo mahatā dhanaskandhena vipannena duḥkhito vedanātta(rta)
S06bsu030_u:3155: evameva māraḥ pāpīyān duḥkhito bhavati durmanā vipratisārī śokaśalyaviddhaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3160: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin te mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ ekataḥ samāgamya cintayanti - kathaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3163: te kathaṃkathāśokaśalyaviddhā bhūtvā upasaṃkrāmanti bodhisattvasyāvatāragaveṣiṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3165: na punaḥ kāyasyānyathātvaṃ bhaviṣyati cittasyānyathātvaṃ vā /
S06bsu030_u:3168: tato māraḥ pāpīyānadhiṣṭhito durbalo bhavati līnacitto bhayamāpannaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3170: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamevāsya na śakto 'vatāraṃ labdhum,
S06bsu030_u:3175: na ca śaknuvanti bodhisattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'cchaṭāmātramapi cittasya mohanaṃ kartum,
S06bsu030_u:3182: te sarve mahatībhirmāraparṣadbhiḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ bodhisattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamupasaṃkrameyurviheṭhābhiprāyāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3183: te 'pi sarve suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na prabhavantyantarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu030_u:3185: tathārūpeṇa hi prajñābalādhānena prajñākhaḍgena prajñāśastreṇa tasmin samaye bodhisattvaḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3186: acintyayā suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñayā aprameyayā asamasamayā bodhisattvastadā samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3187: tena taṃ na pratibalo bhavati māraḥ pāpīyānabhibhavitum /
S06bsu030_u:3192: ye 'pi tāvatsuvikrāntavikrāmin bāhyā ṛṣayaścaturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhinaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3194: ye māraviṣayaṃ kāmadhātumatikramya brahmaloke copapadyante caturṣu ca ārūpyeṣu [Vaidya_60] sadevanikāyeṣu,
S06bsu030_u:3198: kaḥ punarvādo mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāṃ yeṣāmaviṣayo rūparūpyadhātau /
S06bsu030_u:3199: balādhānaprāptaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvastasmin samaye bhavati mahābalādhānasamanvāgato yaduta prajñāpāramitābalena /
S06bsu030_u:3200: ye khalu kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3202: ye kecit suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñābalena samanvāgatā bhavanti tīkṣṇena ca prajñāśastreṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3206: niśraye hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sati calitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3209: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin niśrayaśca bhavati calitaṃ ca bhavati spanditaṃ ca bhavati prapañcanā (ca)
S06bsu030_u:3210: bhavati, te mārasya pāpīyaso vaśagatā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3212: ye 'pi tāvat suvikrāntavikrāmin yāvad bhavāgropapannāḥ sattvā niśritā niśrayanibaddhā niśrayādhyāsitāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3217: ye vā punaranye 'pi kecinniśritā ārūpyeṣu niśrayavinibaddhā niśrayādhyāśritāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3218: bodhisattvastu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayaṃ karoti,
S06bsu030_u:3220: yasmin khalu punaḥ samaye suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyokto viharati,
S06bsu030_u:3257: sa sarvadharmaiścāniśrito na calati na saṃcalati,
S06bsu030_u:3263: asya niśraya iti nopalabhate na manyate,
S06bsu030_u:3265: sarvaniśrayānamanyamāno 'nupalabhamāno 'nabhiniviśamānaḥ na kvacinniśrayamupaiti nopadiśati nābhinandati nādhyavasāya tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu030_u:3267: idaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmaniśrayaviśuddhijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3276: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva ādita eva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutpanne citte bahukuśalamūlasaṃbhārasamudāgataśca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3289: so 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya prajñāpāramitāyāmabhiyukto mārān pāpīyaso 'dhitiṣṭhati tena prajñābalena ca - yathā me mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'vatāraṃ na labheran,
S06bsu030_u:3293: nāpi cittamutpādayanti - kimiti vayamasya bodhisattvasya avatāraṃ gaveṣāmahe,
