S06bsu030_u:3298: saṃvignāśca bhavanti - mā vayaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyāma iti /
S06bsu030_u:3301: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya prayupasthitā avatāraṃ na labhante //
S06bsu030_u:3302_0: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
S06bsu030_u:3302_1: deśyamānāyāṃ chandaśca adhyāśayaśca gauravaṃ va citrīkāraśca śāstṛsaṃjñā ca utpāditā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3303: na ca ṣaṭpāramitāsaṃyuktāyāṃ kathāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā utpāditā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3304: nāpi gambhāīrān dharmān śrutvā kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā vicikitsāyitatvaṃ vā utpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3307: anye ca bahavaḥ sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samādāpitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3309: tasya pūrvāśayacittaviśuddhitayā pūrvāśayāsaṃkliṣṭatayā na mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso 'ntarāyāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3314: anenāpi suvikrāntavikrāmin paryāyeṇa bodhisattvasya mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso na viheṭhāya pratyupasthitā bhavanti //
S06bsu030_u:3315: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpayoganimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:3327: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaviśuddhinimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:3330: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhinimitte carati,
S06bsu030_u:3331: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhyanimitte carati /
S06bsu030_u:3334: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṃbhavaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3338: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇasvabhāvaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3341: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānaprakṛtiviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3344: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaprakṛtiviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3346: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3348: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3351: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3352: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3354: na rūpārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3355: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhivisaṃyoge carati /
S06bsu030_u:3356: evaṃ caran na rūpeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:3367: na pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate /
S06bsu030_u:3391: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3393: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāḥ saṃyogena pratyupasthitā na visaṃyogena /
S06bsu030_u:3396: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścidavabodhaḥ yena saṃyujyeran vā visaṃyujyeran vā /
S06bsu030_u:3397: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3398: sacet suvikrāntavikrāmin dharmāṇāṃ kaścitsaṃyojayitā vā visaṃyojayitā vā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu030_u:3405: prajñāpayettathāgataḥ - ayamasau dharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3411: yasmāttarhi vikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ na kaścitsaṃyogāya pratyupasthito na visaṃyogāya,
S06bsu030_u:3412: tasmānna kaściddharmāṇāṃ kārako vā kārayitā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3420: na ca viparyāsaḥ kenacitsaṃyukto vā visaṃyukto vā /
S06bsu030_u:3427: na cātra kaściddharma upalabhyate yo 'sau viparyāsa ityucyeta /
S06bsu030_u:3428: viparyāsa iti suvikrāntavikrāmin vipratilambha eṣa sattvānām,
S06bsu030_u:3432: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin bāladārako riktena muṣṭinollāpitaḥ saṃjānāti bhūtamiti,
S06bsu030_u:3433: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bālapṛthagjanā ucchedena viparyāsenollāpitā mūḍhā evaṃ manyante - bhūtametaditi /
S06bsu030_u:3434: te abhūte bhūtasaṃjñino viparyāsagrastā durmocyā bhavanti tasmādviparyāsāt /
S06bsu030_u:3435: evaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvabālapṛthagjanā asaṃyuktā avisaṃyuktā bandhanabaddhāḥ saṃdhāvanti /
S06bsu030_u:3442: yaḥ punaḥ saṃyogaṃ nopalabhate na manyate nābhiniviśate,
S06bsu030_u:3445: sacedvisaṃyogaṃ manyeta vā upalabheta vā abhiniviśeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:3447: tatra suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva imamarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan na kenaciddharmeṇa saṃyujyate na visaṃyujyate,
S06bsu030_u:3448: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṃyogāya pratyupasthito bhavati na visaṃyogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3449: iyaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃyogavisaṃyogaparijñā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3450: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pāramadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3451: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3452: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāyāṃ carati /
S06bsu030_u:3454: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānasaṅgaviśuddhau carati /
S06bsu030_u:3456: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgārambaṇe carati /
S06bsu030_u:3459: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāsaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3463: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānāsaṅgatāviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3467: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānārambaṇaviśuddhisaṃyoge carati,
S06bsu030_u:3470: sarvāṇi hyetāni suvikrāntavikrāmin na iñjitāni nimittāni spanditāni caritāni vicaritāni bodhisattvena parijñātāni /
S06bsu030_u:3472: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3474: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannasaṅgatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu030_u:3478: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:3482: na vedanā - na saṃjñā - na saṃskāra - na vijñānātītānāgatapratyutpannāsaṅgārambaṇaviśuddhau carati,
S06bsu030_u:3485: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃścaryāṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu030_u:3488: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3490: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ vivṛtamiti carati,
S06bsu030_u:3492: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3497: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3502: na vedanā va saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3506: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3508: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3509: na rūpamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtyaviviktaṃ cā prakṛtyaśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3510: na vedanā na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3511: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyuatpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛtiśāntaṃ vā carati,
S06bsu030_u:3512: na vijñānamatītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ prakṛtiviviktaṃ vā prakṛttiśāntaṃ vā carati /
S06bsu030_u:3513: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūrimadhigacchati //
S06bsu030_u:3514: punaraparaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ na manyate /
S06bsu030_u:3515: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu030_u:3532: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñatādharmaparipūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3533: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavati daśānāṃ tathāgatabalānām,
S06bsu030_u:3537: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno dvātriṃśatāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇanām /
S06bsu030_u:3545: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvabuddhadharmaparipūrimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3546: [Vaidya_67] evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadhigacchati /
S06bsu030_u:3548: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na rūpe pratiṣṭhate,
S06bsu030_u:3584: na hi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vidyate /
S06bsu030_u:3589: ālayo vā kūṭastho vā dharmāṇāmabhaviṣyat, ni(nya?)
S06bsu030_u:3590: darśayiṣyattathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam - idaṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3593: yasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin sarvadharmā apratiṣṭhitāḥ anālayāḥ asaṃcayāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3595: tasmāttathāgato dharmāṇāṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ vā ālayaṃ vā saṃcayaṃ vā na nirdiśati /
S06bsu030_u:3602: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin catasṛṇāṃ mahānadīnāmanavataptāt sarasaḥ prasravantīnāṃ nāstyadhiṣṭhānamanyatra mahāsamudrāt,
S06bsu030_u:3605: anabhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na tatra sthānaṃ nāsthānaṃ nādhiṣṭhānam,
S06bsu030_u:3607: sthānamiti vā adhiṣṭhānamiti vā asthānamiti vā abhisaṃskāra iti suvikrāntavikrāmin gaṇanaiṣā nirdiṣṭā /
S06bsu030_u:3611: ayaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya sarvadharmāpratiṣṭhānayogaḥ [Vaidya_68] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3612: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ kṣipraṃ sarvajñadharmān paripūrayati,
S06bsu030_u:3618: tasmāttarhi suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvena mahāsattvena arthaṃ kartukāmena,
S06bsu030_u:3639: dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā anyena vā punaḥ kenacillokena sahadharmeṇa,
S06bsu030_u:3644: sarvasattvānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayitukāmena asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ ghaṭitavyaṃ vyāyacchitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogamanuyuktena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3645_0: nāhaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvasya kaṃciddharmamevaṃ kṣipraṃ paripūrikaraṃ samanupaśyāmi
S06bsu030_u:3645_1: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yatheha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāmabhiyogaḥ pratipattiḥ asya
S06bsu030_u:3646: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvā asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06bsu030_u:3647: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā ime bodhisattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiviti /
S06bsu030_u:3648: yeṣāṃ keṣāṃcit suvikrāntavikrāmin iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotrāvabhāsamapyāgamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3651: teṣāmapyahaṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ vadāmi - niṣṭhā ca tatra gantavyā - mahāprajñāsaṃbhāropacitā hyete kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā,
S06bsu030_u:3653: yeṣāṃ ca suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparivartanirdeśo hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3654: kiṃcāpi tatra kecinna vyākṛtā bhaviṣyanti saṃmukhaṃ buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3655: atha ca punarveditavyametat - āsannā hyete vyākaraṇasya,
S06bsu030_u:3658: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartante,
S06bsu030_u:3659: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - āsannā hyete sattvā uttarakuruṣūpapatteḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3660: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hasyaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3662: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaṃ prayacchanti muktatyāgāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3663: sattvāṃśca dānena priyavadyatayā arthacaryayā samānārthatayā ca saṃgṛhṇanti,
S06bsu030_u:3666: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramime sattvā mahābhogā bhavantyuccakulīnāśca //
S06bsu030_u:3667: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā dānaśīlāśca bhavanti śīlasaṃpannāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3674: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastagatā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3676: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ pañcadaśyāṃ purato 'rthakaraṇe saṃniṣaṇṇasya cakraratnaṃ prādurbhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3679: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitāparivarto hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3681: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlasamanvāgatāśca bhaviṣyanti śobhanasamācārāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3689: ye kecitsuvikrāntavikrāmin pariśuddhataraiḥ kuśalamūlaiḥ samanvāgatā utkṛṣṭakuśalamūlāśca pūrvaṃ ca dāna dadati paścātsvayaṃ bhuñjate,
S06bsu030_u:3690: prāk cānyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyāni kurvanti paścādātmanaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3694: veditavyametat - acirādete aprakampyaṃ devānāṃ trāyastriṃśatāmaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3696: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:3698: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye sattvāścaturṇāṃ brahmavihārāṇāṃ lābhino bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3700: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya [Vaidya_70] kasyacid bodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśa upanaṃsyate,
S06bsu030_u:3702: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin vārṣikeṣu māseṣu pratyupasthiteṣu iyaṃ mahāpṛthivī meghān pratītya snigdhā bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3707: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī abhyantarā ca abhiṣyanditā snigdhā ca bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3711: te 'bhiṣyanditāḥ santo bahūn śākhāpatrapalāśān muñcanti bahupuṣpaphalāśca bhavanti,
S06bsu030_u:3713: evamiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī puṣpaphalotsasarastaḍāgaistasmin samaye upaśobhitā bhavati /
S06bsu030_u:3714: tataśca tuṣṭā bhavanti manuṣyāśca amanuṣyāśca tāni puṣpaphalāni paribhuñjamānāstaṃ ca gandhaṃ jighrantaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3715: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yadā bodhisattvasya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā abhimukhī bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3721: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye 'navataptasya nāgarājasya bhavane sattvā upapannāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3722: te catvāro mahānadīrutsṛjati yā mahāsamudraṃ saṃtarpayanti /
S06bsu030_u:3723: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā hastamupanaṃsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3727: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye kecitsattvāḥ sumeroḥ parvatarājasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3728: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇā bhavanti /
S06bsu030_u:3729: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3730: sarve te ekāṃ gatiṃ gamiṣyanti yaduta tathāgatagatiṃ sarvajñatāgatim //
S06bsu030_u:3731: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sāgaro mahāsamudraḥ sarvodakasaṃdhārayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3733: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin yasya kasyacidbodhisattvasya ayaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśo hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3734: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - kṣipramayaṃ sarvadharmasāgaratāṃ sarvadharmabhājanatāṃ sarvadharmasamavasaraṇatāmanuprāpsyati,
S06bsu030_u:3736: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin sūryamaṇḍalamabhyudgacchat sarvā diśaḥ prabhādhyāmīkaroti,
S06bsu030_u:3737: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvānāṃ dharmāvabhāsakṛtyena pratyutpasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3738: ihābhyudgacchan suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ [Vaidya_71] sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāvabhāsena pratyupasthito bhavati,
S06bsu030_u:3743: asyāṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo 'gratāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu030_u:3746: eṣā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin agrā śikṣā jyeṣṭhā varā pravarā anuttarā niruttarā yeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣā /
S06bsu030_u:3747: asyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāṃ prāpnoti,
S06bsu030_u:3751: asyāṃ hi suvikrāntavikrāmin śikṣāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carantaḥ śikṣitāḥ śikṣiṣyante śikṣante ca /
S06bsu030_u:3752: asyāṃ ca śikṣāyāṃ supratiṣṭhitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'nuttarāṃ śikṣāpariśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśitavantaḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3757: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣito bhavati laukike vā lokottare vā,
S06bsu030_u:3764: sarvadharmā hi suvikrāntavikrāmin asaktā abaddhā amuktāḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3765: nāpi kasyaciddharmasya saṅgena pratyupasthitā na bandhanena /
S06bsu030_u:3794: asaktā iti suvikrāntavikrāmin na teṣāṃ kaścinmocayitā,
S06bsu030_u:3802: yataśca nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃyujyate vā badhyeta vā,
S06bsu030_u:3818: evaṃ caran suvikrāntavikrāmin bodhisattva āsanno bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3820: imāmahaṃ suvikrāntavikrāmin mudrāṃ sthāpayāmi bodhisattvānāṃ saṃśayacchedāya prajñāpāramitāmabhiyuktānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratām /
S06bsu030_u:3822: na pratibalā mama śrāvakā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudrāṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ dhārayitum //
S06bsu030_u:3823_0: atha khalu bhagavān bhadrapālasusārthavāhapūrvaṃgamāni pañcamātrāṇi bodhisattvaśatānyāmantrayate
S06bsu030_u:3823_1: sma suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ ca bodhisattvam - śakyatha yūyaṃ kulaputrāstathāgate parinirvṛte
S06bsu030_u:3823_2: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimikāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ saddharmāntardhānakālasamaye
S06bsu030_u:3825: evamukte bodhisattvā bhagavantametadavocat - śakyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītamanuttaraṃ
S06bsu030_u:3828: kiṃcāpi bhagavan sa kālo mahābhayo mahākāntāro mahāghoraśca bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3829: yadbhūyasā ca tasmin samaye sattvāḥ saddharmavyavanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3830_1: paruṣāḥ durvacasaḥ śaṭhāḥ kuhakā māyāvino 'dharmacāriṇaḥ kalahabhaṇḍanavivādavigrahabahulā
S06bsu030_u:3830_2: asaṃvarasthitāḥ lubdhā lobhābhibhūtāḥ kusīdāḥ hīnavīryā muṣitasmṛtayo 'saṃprajñāstuṇḍāḥ
S06bsu030_u:3831: asya gambhīrasya dharmavinayasya dharmaratnakoṣasya apratyudgatamanaḥśīlāśca bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3832: atha ca punarutsahāmahe vayaṃ bhagavan imaṃ tathāgatasya anekakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrakuśalamūlasamudānītamanuttaraṃ dharmaratnakoṣaṃ dhārayituṃ vācayitum,
S06bsu030_u:3833: ye ca tasminnantakāle parīttaparīttā api [Vaidya_73] sattvā bhaviṣyanti ebhirdharmairarthikāḥ,
S06bsu030_u:3844: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmidaṃ dharmādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñāpāramitānirdeśamadhitiṣṭhiti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3845: mārasya ca pāpīyaso 'smin dharmaparyāye mārapāśānāṃ chedāya adhiṣṭhānamakarot /
S06bsu030_u:3846: atha khalu bhagavān smitaṃ prāviṣkaroti sma,
S06bsu030_u:3853: mahāntaṃ ca nirnādanirghoṣamakārṣuḥ - mahādhiṣṭhānaṃ batedaṃ tathāgatenādhiṣṭhitaṃ yatrāgatirmārāṇāṃ pāpīyasām /
S06bsu030_u:3854: sarvamārapāśa hi cchinnā anena dharmādhiṣṭhānena ca /
S06bsu030_u:3855: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca bhūyo mārebhyaḥ pāpīyobhyo 'bhayaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam /
S06bsu030_u:3856: ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3858: māraṃ ca te pāpīyāṃsaṃ sasainyaṃ parājayiṣyanti ye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3860: atha khalu bhagavān suvikrāntavikrāmiṇaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - evametatsuvikrāntavikrāmin,
S06bsu030_u:3863: baddhasīmā suvikrāntavikrāmin mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmasmin dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe tathāgatena /
S06bsu030_u:3864: ye 'tra khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3867: anākramaṇīyāśca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3871: na khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ saṃkliṣṭānāṃ sattvānāṃ hastaṃ gamiṣyati,
S06bsu030_u:3875: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti hastyājāneyā vā aśvājāneyā vā,
S06bsu030_u:3881: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin manuṣyājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmime evaṃrūpā dharmaparyāyāḥ paribhogāya hastaṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3882: tadyathāpi nāma suvikrāntavikrāmin [Vaidya_74] upoṣadho nāgarājaḥ supratiṣṭhitaśca nāgarājaḥ airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ /
S06bsu030_u:3885: nāpi te anyeṣāṃ devānāmupabhogāya paribhogāya saṃkrāmanti,
S06bsu030_u:3887: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindro 'bhikrāmati vyūhaṃ kṛtvā,
S06bsu030_u:3888: tathā tathā cāpi nāgarājānastādṛśameva vyūhaṃ kṛtvā upasaṃkrāmanti paribhogāya /
S06bsu030_u:3889: evameva suvikrāntavikrāmin ye te bhaviṣyanti manuṣyendrāḥ puruṣendrāḥ teṣāmime dharmaparyāyā upabhogaparibhogāya bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3891: teṣāṃ ceme dharmaparyāyā mahāvyūhā mahāviṣkārā mahādharmālokā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3894: asya dharmaparyāyasya ekaṃ nayaṃ ye dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3895: kaḥ punarvādo ye sakalasamāptaṃ lekhayitvā dhārayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti vaistārikaṃ ca kariṣyanti,
S06bsu030_u:3897: parigṛhītāste khalu punaḥ suvikrāntavikrāmin anena dharmaparyāyeṇa bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu030_u:3900: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe anekairaprameyairbodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu030_u:3902: niyatāśca te tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā abhūvan bodhāya //
S06bsu030_u:3913: sarvākāramidaṃ vadanti munayo viśvaṃ yayā saṃgatās
S06bsu030_u:3915: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu030_u:3916: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ // 2 //
